EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited – Brazil Service Center Grand Opening Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customers, We take great pleasure in inviting you to our Repair Service Center Grand Opening Event at our new facility in São José dos Campos on August 8, 2019. Please join us in celebrating this great accomplishment which will allow us to be more closely connected with our customers in Latin America, in addition to providing a local facility for Boeing, Airbus and Embraer Avionics repairs and overhauls. Our relationships in Latin America are an integral part of our business and we would appreciate you joining us for this event! The event will start at 11am with an opening ceremony and tour of our repair facility. Lunch and snacks will be provided.
PLEASE RSVP HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_Brazil_Service_Center_Invitation_2019_Brazil_Registration_LP.html]]>
The address for the event is: Parque Tecnologico Estrada Dr. Altino Bondensan, 500 - Eugênio de Melo São José dos Campos - SP, zip code 12247-016 Hope to see you there!
